China-U.S. cooperation 'no longer optional but imperative', for both and the world - Wang YiChinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi said on Friday that the most urgent task for Sino-U.S. relations is to establish a correct understanding and cooperation between the two sides is "no longer an option but an imperative" for the world. Fri, 05 Jan 2024 11:54:30 GMT SF4OYDZENFILXLWOGK5V6TV4KI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-us-cooperation-no-longer-optional-imperative-both-world-wang-yi-2024-01-05/Liz Lee, Ethan Wang世界中国

Chinese wealth manager Zhongzhi files for bankruptcy liquidationChinese wealth manager Zhongzhi Enterprise Group has filed for bankruptcy liquidation after failing to repay debt, as the firm grapples with a deepening property market downturn. Fri, 05 Jan 2024 10:45:30 GMT SSE2R3OBVNPSLMATY7MKJFNRVA https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/chinese-court-accepts-wealth-manager-zhongzhis-bankruptcy-filing-2024-01-05/Reuters商业金融
BlackRock appoints Hua Fan as head of China, succeeding Tony Tang -sourcesBlackRock Inc has appointed Hua Fan, formerly general manager of its majority-owned China asset management unit, as head of China, two sources with knowledge of the matter said. Fri, 05 Jan 2024 10:12:51 GMT NLPIOANWOBIXLGCNIQRCVMSVKY https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/blackrock-appoints-hua-fan-head-china-succeeding-tony-tang-sources-2024-01-05/Selena Li商业金融
Fairy-tale ice sculptures lure droves of tourists into China's HarbinChina's annual Ice and Snow Festival, with its fairy-tale ice sculptures, opened on Friday attracting throngs of tourists who shuffled carefully over the slippy ice and snow and dragged their children in sledges around the park. Fri, 05 Jan 2024 08:14:50 GMT VZTAN76V4NOY7G2BHQXFEPT7PU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/fairy-tale-ice-sculptures-lure-droves-tourists-into-china-harbin-2024-01-05/Nicoco Chan, Liz Lee世界中国
Tesla to fix 1.62 mln vehicles in China - regulatorTesla is doing an effective recall on 1.62 million vehicles, including its models S, X, 3 and Y in China, the market regulator said on Friday. Fri, 05 Jan 2024 07:57:34 GMT 4YI55BJA2RJCNF3TD3W73SRCCY https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/tesla-fixes-162-mln-vehicles-china-regulator-2024-01-05/Reuters商业汽车与交通
